data.title: Turner & Townsend
data.meta_description: As Poland accelerates its economic growth, Turner & Townsend is driving the projects and programmes that will shaping its future prosperity and sustainability.
data.text:
Powering Poland’s growth through projects and programmes

Growth is accelerating in Poland’s dynamic economy, boosting activity across manufacturing, transport, construction and other sectors. As the country embraces the energy transition, investment is growing in clean energy, including renewables and nuclear, plus expansion of the transmission network. We are working with clients to make the most of these opportunities and minimise the risks.

Our understanding of market conditions positions us to advise international and local investors on projects and programmes. In the burgeoning data centre and industrial, science and technology sectors our expertise is in demand.

We are working with clients to navigate local market policy and procedures and develop innovative responses to challenges. As clients focus on sustainability and net zero grows, we are bringing the know-how to target and achieve green goals.

Transforming performance and mitigating risk

We have a long-established presence in Poland, having worked in the market for well over a decade. With more than 50 professionals based at our offices in Krakow and Warsaw, we bring local insight and experience to all we do. Our knowledge and proactive approach empower us to add value to projects and programmes.

Across sectors including corporate and office, data centres, industrial, science and technology, retail, and hotels and hospitality, clients value our expertise. Innovative digital tools and approaches are embedded in our capabilities, enabling us to transform project performance and limit risks.
